teamplanner_traits_empty_message: SELECT UNITS TO ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM!
teamplanner_reminders_toggle_tooltip_bod: When Reminders are ON, Champions in your selected Team are highlighted during gameplay.
teamimport_save_subtext: Save a player's team to your Team Planner.
teamimport_paste_subtext: Copy a team code to your clipboard to paste in a team.
teamimport_duplicate_team_warning: You already have this team saved.
teamimport_error_invalid_subtext: We couldn't recognize the team code from your clipboard.
teamimport_error_incorrect_code: Team Code is from an outdated or invalid Champion Set.
teamimport_error_max_teams: You have reached the maximum number of Teams available.
teamimport_error_empty_team_subtext: The pasted team code has no champions. Please copy a different one.
teamimport_error_set_mismatch_subtext: Please paste in a team code for {{setName}} - {{setTitle}} instead.
teamimport_tooltip_hint: Where do I find a team code?
teamimport_tooltip_text: Team codes can be found in online TFT guides or shared by other players. You can also save teams at the end of every TFT match.
myteams_tooltip_reminders_body: When Reminders are ON, champions you have selected in Team Planner are highlighted during gameplay.
myteams_tooltip_snapshot_body: When in a game, Snapshot imports champions directly from your field into Team Planner.
myteams_new_team_disabled_tooltip: Please delete a team to create a new team
myteams_empty_state_body: Save multiple teams in Team Planner and reference them in a game.
myteams_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{teamName}}?
